products.name: Edenic Vegan Men's T-Shirt
products.description: Premium quality t-shirt featuring the 'Edenic Vegan' design. Made from 100% organic cotton, this comfortable shirt celebrates the plant-based lifestyle of the Village of Peace community.

products.name: Vegan Life Tote Bag
products.description: Durable canvas tote bag with 'Vegan Life' messaging. Perfect for shopping at the local market or carrying your daily essentials. Features reinforced handles and eco-friendly materials.

products.name: Healing Body & Soul Women's Classic Tee
products.description: Classic design t-shirt featuring the Village of Peace logo and community messaging. Soft, breathable fabric perfect for the desert climate. Available in multiple sizes.

products.name: Sewing Seeds of Change Sweatshirt
products.description: Comfortable sweatshirt with the inspiring 'Sewing Seeds of Change' message. Perfect for cooler desert evenings. Made from sustainable materials supporting our eco-conscious values.

products.name: Vegan Life. Vegan Love T-Shirt (Dimona Village of Peace)
products.description:
Village of Peace white t-shirt. Features 'The Village of Peace Dimona
Vegan Life. vegan Love' design. Premium quality community apparel supporting our mission of unity and sustainable living.

products.name: One Family Unity T-Shirt - White
products.description: Premium white t-shirt featuring "The Village of Peace Dimona" logo and "One Family" message in blue. Comfortable unisex design celebrating our community unity.

products.name: Edenic Vegan T-Shirt - White
products.description: Classic white t-shirt with "Edenic Vegan" messaging and Village of Peace branding. Premium quality POD apparel supporting our plant-based lifestyle.

products.name: Village of Peace Logo T-Shirt
products.description: White t-shirt featuring the official Village of Peace Dimona logo. Premium quality print-on-demand apparel celebrating our heritage.

products.name: Reviving Our World T-Shirt
products.description: Inspirational t-shirt with "Reviving Our World" message and VOP branding. Premium POD apparel supporting our mission of global healing.

products.name: New World Passover T-Shirt
products.description: Special edition t-shirt featuring "New World Passover" design. Premium quality print-on-demand apparel.

products.name: Healing Body & Soul T-Shirt - White
products.description: White women's fitted t-shirt featuring "Healing Body & Soul" in green and brown text with VOP logo.

products.name: Healing Body & Soul Long Sleeve - White
products.description: White long-sleeve shirt with "The Village of Peace Dimona" and "Healing Body & Soul" branding.

products.name: Planting Seeds of Peace Mug
products.description: White ceramic mug featuring "Planting Seeds of Peace" in green and brown text with VOP Dimona logo.

products.name: Sewing Seeds of Change Mug
products.description: Premium ceramic mug with "Sewing Seeds of Change" message and Village of Peace branding.

products.name: Village of Peace Mastering Life Sweatshirt - White
products.description: Premium white sweatshirt featuring "The Village of Peace Dimona" logo with Africa design and "Village of Peace - Mastering the Art of Living" text in green and brown. Comfortable long-sleeve POD apparel for cooler weather.
